about_the_game:
Command nature itself to defend you from being abducted by the Robot horde.

Build, Upgrade, and then Move your Towers in this unique twist on the Tower Defence genre. With Rogue-Lite mechanics every run offers new strategies, and every death unlocks new upgrades. Grow. Evolve. Destroy the Robots!

Mutate Synergies

Gain powerful upgrades and build devastating synergies as you play. Create your strategy and adapt to the Mutations you find. But when you die, the mutations are all gone. Build a new strategy for each life and master the synergies.

Evolve new Towers

With every death the Flora Hive adapts and evolves new strengths. Gather Evolution Points as you play and spend them on the Evolution Tree to gain permanent upgrades and unlock new Towers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
